title: 12/21/20 DPS-BEST OF
itunes:title: 12/21/20 DPS-BEST OF
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps all that happened in the world of sports this weekend. The College Football Playoffs are set, who deserved to be in? Do the Jets still have a shot at the top pick in next year's draft, despite their win? We're joined by NBC's Chris Simms, The Athletic's Andy Staples, Army Head Football Coach Jeff Monken and Actor/Comedian/Noted Jets fan Hank Azaria. Plus, DP is making it his mission to get Army Football into a Bowl game.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps all that happened in the world of sports this weekend. The College Football Playoffs are set, who deserved to be in? Do the Jets still have a shot at the top pick in next year's draft, despite their win? We're joined by NBC's Chris Simms, The Athletic's Andy Staples, Army Head Football Coach Jeff Monken and Actor/Comedian/Noted Jets fan Hank Azaria. Plus, DP is making it his mission to get Army Football into a Bowl game.
